thread.title: Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview
thread.title_full: Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview

author: Brent Ledet
title: Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview
text:
Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social Member Center: Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview Posted: LSU head coach Les Miles (Source: Josh Auzenne/WAFB) BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) - 
If viewing this story on a mobile device or in an email, click here to watch . 
LSU head coach Les Miles held his weekly news conference at 12:30 p.m. Monday. 
No. 5 LSU (6-0) will host Western Kentucky (6-1) on Saturday, October 24 in Tiger Stadium. 
Kickoff is scheduled for 6 p.m. The game will be televised on ESPNU. 
Copyright 2015 WAFB . All rights reserved. Lunch with Les Miles - Week 8 Preview More>> SLIDESHOW: LSU vs. Florida No. 6 LSU was able to pull off a big win against No. 8 Florida on a fake punt that was run in for a touchdown by kicker Trent Domingue. more>> No. 6 LSU was able to pull off a big win against No. 8 Florida on a fake punt that was run in for a touchdown by kicker Trent Domingue. more>>
